QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Elder care - resources
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations are good resources for information on aging and elder care: US Department of Health & Human Services -- www.hhs.gov/aging/long-term-care/index.html , Eldercare locator -- eldercare.acl.gov/Public/Resources/Index.aspx , National Institute on Aging -- www.nia.nih.gov , American Geriatrics Society, HealthinAging.org -- www.healthinaging.org/age-friendly-healthcare-you/care-settings ,
